attributes.action: Change the way Incapacity Medicals and the uneccessary stress and upset it causes is decided upon
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I am a severe asthmatic with other ailments that are invisible, like fibromyalgia and plateur Fascitis. We believe it should not be a member of the Benefits agency who decides wether a claimant needs a DSS medical, but a qualified Doctor, who based on information from the claiments GP makes the neccesary decision. Invisible illnesses are not treated seriuously enough by either the Government or the Benefits Agency
